entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with snow this morning. Snow over higher terrain this morning and early this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1400 metres this afternoon. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then clearing. Flurries over higher terrain this evening and after midnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 1000 metres this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
